name: Okunis
description:
Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Gadget
Instability: -40%
Optimal Charge Rate: +100%
Resistance: +10%
Optimal Charge Window: -15%
Overcharge Rate: +100%
Focus power on a deposit's sweet spot with the Okunis. Shubin Interstellar designed this mining accessory to both reduce a deposit's instability and quickly deliver power once reaching the optimal charge window. This exceptional performance most be managed properly as the power spike also significantly increases the overcharge rate.
description_cn:
制造商：舒宾星际（Shubin Interstellar）
物品类型：采矿附件
不稳定性：-40%
充能速度：+100%
抗性：+10%
充能绿区：-15%
过载充能速度：+100%
使用奥昆尼斯将能量集中在矿石的最佳位置。舒宾星际设计了这种采矿附件，既可以降低矿石的不稳定性，又可以在达到充能绿区后快速充能。由于功率峰值时也会显着增加过载充能率，因此这种性能卓越的设备需要妥善管理。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-ShubinInterstellar_NewBabbage
